column4: Hi guys, I'm sharing windows xp's files, but I can't access "program files". How do I enter the username/password
XP has the programfiles directory some how very very very very blocked from getting shared. I cant even get to it from a nother xp box.
there may be some xp setting to remove the lock on it. but ive never found it. - i have shared direcories INSIDE the 'program files' directory
